Package eu.amidst.core.inference

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    InferenceAlgorithm
    This interface handles and defines the algorithm used to run inference in BayesianNetwork models.
    Sampler
    This interface defines a sampling model.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ImportanceSampling
    This class implements the interface InferenceAlgorithm and defines the Importance Sampling algorithm.
    ImportanceSamplingExperiments
    Created by dario on 15/05/15.
    InferenceEngine
    This class defines the Inference Engine for Bayesian Network models.
    MAPInference
    This class implements the interface InferenceAlgorithm and defines the MAP Inference algorithm.
    MAPInferenceExperiments
    Created by dario on 01/06/15.
    VMPNormalTest
    Created by ana@cs.aau.dk on 10/02/15.
    VMPTest
